p: In this article we describe the application of TIME (Tuberculosis Impact Module and Estimates), a user friendly TB transmission model at sub-national level in South Africa. We used the model to estimate the impact on TB incidence and mortality from 2017 to 2035 of scale-up of TB screening, linkage and retention interventions to achieve the 90-(90)-90 TB targets of the Stop TB Partnership Global Plan to End TB [ 14]. This work was conducted as part of the South African National TB Think Tank [ 15].
